EmailTemplate.name: Corp GA Initial Registration – Second Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Corp GA Initial Filing – Second Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As part of your compliance package, we help ensure your required state filings are completed and filed on time.
The state of Georgia requires you to file an initial annual registration for your corporation within 90 days of the business being formed. Please note that if your business was formed this year between October 2nd and December 31st, you may file your documents next year between January 1st to April 1st. Failure to file your initial annual registration on time may result in late fees.
Before we can complete your filings, we need additional information and payment for the state fees. The required state filings fees are listed below*.
Name of Filing: Initial Annual Registration Fee to State of Georgia: $50
*Please note that state filing fees are subject to change without notice.
Please sign in to your LegalZoom account here and click the Completed Orders tab: https://www.legalzoom.com/LZWeb/Welcome/SignIn.aspx?TIMESTRING=&iProcess=. There you can access your compliance package and fill out the Annual Report questionnaire.
Once you provide the necessary information and fees, we will file your forms with the state. If you have already provided us with these items, please disregard this email. This is your second email reminder of this state filing. LegalZoom processing fees for this filing are included as long as you remain an active compliance member.
You can reach me at {!User.Phone}, {!User.Extension}, [***Input Business Hours HERE***].
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!User.Name} {!User.Extension} Account Management Services T: 877-808-1918, M-F 9:00 am – 6 pm PT {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
